thread.title: Sen. Jeff Merkley to Portland demonstrators: 'We need your involvement now more than ever'
thread.title_full: Sen. Jeff Merkley to Portland demonstrators: 'We need your involvement now more than ever'

author: Jim Ryan | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Sen. Jeff Merkley to Portland demonstrators: 'We need your involvement now more than ever'
text: Sen. Jeff Merkley's state director read a statement on his behalf that, in part, highlighted his votes against three of Trump's Cabinet picks. The statement also praised demonstrators for their activism and proclaimed local organizing is more important than ever.
